ai-patthana17.10:0.2_0: Having given the immaterial states produced by the phenomena that are counterpart of
ai-patthana17.10:0.3_0: I used to wear a trainee’s head,
ai-patthana17.10:1.1_0: A trainee, or an adept gives rise to the teaching. Namely, no cause or reason.
ai-patthana17.10:2.1_0: An indeterminate nature, while the teaching doesn’t give rise to unskillful qualities, no cause or condition.
ai-patthana17.10:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana17.10:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana17.10:3.1_0: Not in training, nor no cause or condition.
ai-patthana17.10:3.1_4: the five hindrances are not clear.
